remarks: Composition of lattice translations of an atom.  TODO:  See if this can shorten some ~ ltrnel uses.  (Contributed by NM, 1-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ltrnel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnel.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnel.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrncoelN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` ( G ` P ) ) e. A /\ -. ( F ` ( G ` P ) ) .<_ W ) ) $.
